text: Girish Kumar Sanghi is an Indian industrialist and politician. He is the owner of Hyderabad based Industries Group. He is also the owner of the Vaartha newspaper which is published in Hindi and Telugu languages from Hyderabad. Girish Kumar Sanghi is also active in politics and is associated with Indian National Congress. He is currently a Rajya Sabha member. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Girish Kumar Sanghi
